line_1: While Irwin, Lugar, Aire an' Doon,
While Irwin, Lugar, Aire an' Doon,
line_2: Gied Forth an' Tay a lift aboon;

line_1: While Irwin, Lugar, Aire an' Doon,
line_2: Yarrow an' Tweed, to monie a tune,

line_1: O, a' ye Bards on bonie DOON!
line_2: An' wha on AIRE your chanters tune!

line_1: O, a' ye Bards on bonie DOON!
O, a' ye Bards on bonie DOON!
line_2: His heart will never get aboon!
